artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Bolan Fabrics; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill pattern in yellow and brown weft stripes on orange warp. 3 orange warp. Tan, white, yellow & metallic gold weft. Twill. Left selvedge. On 8.5x11" card with 99.1.1185.17. "H8-A" written on card. Sheet of weaving descripton on face of card. (orange, yellow, beige, white, metallic gold)

title: Bittersweet
